General Information

By drinking aloe vera juice daily, the vitamins, minerals, amino acids, enzymes and plysacharides contained within, work together to build and maintain a healthy body.

Warnings

if symptoms persist, seek the advice of your health care professional

Common Uses

general wellbeing & digestive tonic

Ingredients

99.9% aloe miller extract, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate

Directions

50 ml twice daily / refrigertae bottle after opening
